alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 4:38AM AKST until January 29 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Cold wind chills to 55 below and blowing snow occurring. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. The cold wind chills will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. * WHERE...In Brooks Range Passes * WHEN...Until 6 PM Saturday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...North winds gusting 30 to 40 mph are causing blowing and drifting snow with low visibility in passes. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
